Class QueryLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.java.query.QueryLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QueryReader

    public class QueryLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements QueryReader
    An implementation of QueryReader. Reads a query for each line of the file.

    10-16-2017

      • loadQueries

        public java.util.List<Query> loadQueries(java.io.File queryFile,
                                         Tokenizer tokenizer)
        Reads the queries from a file an loads them to a List, with the respective id and content.
        Specified by:
        loadQueries in interface QueryReader
        Parameters:
        queryFile - The file that contains the queries.
        tokenizer - A tokenizer to process the text from the query file.
        Returns:
        A List of Query objects that represent the queries on the file.
